verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu kailā rūpe āliṅgana
tāṅre karāilā sabāra caraṇa vandana

synonyms: tabe—at that time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā—did; rūpe—unto Rūpa Gosvāmī; āliṅgana—embracing; tāṅre—him; karāilā—induced to do; sabāra—of all of them; caraṇa vandana—worshiping the lotus feet.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then embraced Rūpa Gosvāmī and asked him to offer prayers at the lotus feet of all the devotees present.
